scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts a pastoral landscape with rolling blue hills in the background and a green, grassy foreground dotted with small, rounded bushes or rocks. In the left foreground, three figures are partially visible, wearing brown hooded robes and blue leggings. To their right, a man in a red robe and blue leggings stands with his hands clasped. Further to the right, a figure in a brown hooded robe holds a staff and points to the right. The overall impression is of a journey or pilgrimage through a natural setting.
